mapper:
<#-- cache – 缓存 cache-ref – 关联其他命名空间的缓存 resultMap – 描述如何从数据库结果集中获取对象 parameterMap – Deprecated! Old-school way to map parameters. Inline parameters are preferred and this element may be removed in the future. Not documented here. sql – 可被重复引用的sql块 insert – 插入声明的映射 update – 更新声明的映射 delete – 删除声明的映射 select – 查询声明的映射 -->
<#-- 自定义缓存实现类：
默认缓存实现类：
-->
<#list Columns as column>
</#list>
<#list Columns as column> <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#if column_has_next>, </#if> </#list>
<#list Columns as column> <#if column.JavaType == "java.sql.Date" || column.JavaType == "java.sql.Timestamp"> <#if dbType == "oracle">
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} >= TO_DATE(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_BEGINTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} <= TO_DATE(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_ENDTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
<#elseif dbType == "sqlserver">
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} >= CONVERT(DATETIME, <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_BEGINTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 120)
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} <= CONVERT(DATETIME, <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_ENDTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 120)
<#elseif dbType == "mysql">
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} >= STR_TO_DATE(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_BEGINTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, '%Y-%m-%d %T')
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} <= STR_TO_DATE(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_ENDTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, '%Y-%m-%d %T')
<#elseif dbType == "postgresql">
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} >= to_timestamp(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_BEGINTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} <= to_timestamp(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_ENDTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
</#if> <#elseif column.JavaType == "java.sql.Time"> <#if dbType == "oracle">
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} >= TO_DATE(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_BEGINTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 'HH24:MI:SS')
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} <= TO_DATE(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_ENDTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 'HH24:MI:SS')
<#elseif dbType == "sqlserver">
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} >= CONVERT(DATETIME, <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_BEGINTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 24)
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} <= CONVERT(DATETIME, <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_ENDTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 24)
<#elseif dbType == "mysql">
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} >= STR_TO_DATE(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_BEGINTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, '%T')
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} <= STR_TO_DATE(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_ENDTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, '%T')
<#elseif dbType == "postgresql">
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} >= to_timestamp(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_BEGINTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 'hh24:mi:ss')
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} <= to_timestamp(<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_ENDTIME<#noparse>}</#noparse>, 'hh24:mi:ss')
</#if> <#elseif column.JavaType == "java.lang.String">
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#noparse>}</#noparse>
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} LIKE <#noparse>#{</#noparse>_${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}_LIKE<#noparse>}</#noparse>
<#else>
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#noparse>}</#noparse>
</#if> </#list>
INSERT INTO ${CodeUnderlineUpper} ( <#list Columns as column> ${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#if column_has_next>, </#if> </#list> ) VALUES ( <#list Columns as column> <#if column.JavaType == "java.sql.Date" || column.JavaType == "java.sql.Timestamp"> <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}, jdbcType=${column.JdbcType}<#noparse>}</#noparse><#if column_has_next>, </#if> <#elseif column.JavaType == "java.sql.Time"> <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}, jdbcType=${column.JdbcType}<#noparse>}</#noparse><#if column_has_next>, </#if> <#else> <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#noparse>}</#noparse><#if column_has_next>, </#if> </#if> </#list> )
DELETE FROM ${CodeUnderlineUpper} M
<#-- https://mybatis.org/mybatis-3/sqlmap-xml.html --> <#-- Parameters --> <#-- #{height,javaType=double,jdbcType=NUMERIC,numericScale=2} -->
UPDATE ${CodeUnderlineUpper}
<#list Columns as column> <#if column.JavaType == "java.sql.Date" || column.JavaType == "java.sql.Timestamp">
${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}, jdbcType=${column.JdbcType}<#noparse>}</#noparse>
<#elseif column.JavaType == "java.sql.Time">
${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}, jdbcType=${column.JdbcType}<#noparse>}</#noparse>
<#else>
AND <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#noparse>}</#noparse>
</#if> </#list>
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM ${CodeUnderlineUpper} M
SELECT
FROM ${CodeUnderlineUpper} M
<#if HasPrimaryKey == '1'>
WHERE <#list Columns as column> <#if column.PrimaryKey == "1"> <#if column.JavaType == "java.lang.String"> <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#noparse>}</#noparse> <#else> <#noparse>${alias}</#noparse>.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#noparse>}</#noparse> </#if> <#if column_has_next>AND </#if> </#if> </#list>
</#if>
<#if HasPrimaryKey == '1'>
SELECT
FROM ${CodeUnderlineUpper} M
</#if>
<#-- 存在父级 --> <#if RefParents?exists> <#list RefParents as reference>
SELECT
FROM ${CodeUnderlineUpper} M WHERE <#list reference.ArrowColumnList as column> <#if column.ArrowTailColumn.JavaType == "java.lang.String"> M.${column.ArrowTailColumn.CodeUnderlineUpper} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.ArrowTailColumn.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#noparse>}</#noparse> <#else> M.${column.ArrowTailColumn.CodeUnderlineUpper} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${column.ArrowTailColumn.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#noparse>}</#noparse> </#if> <#if column_has_next>AND </#if> </#list>
</#list>
<#list RefParents as reference>
<#list Columns as column>
</#list>
<#list reference.ParentTable.Columns as column>
</#list>
SELECT <#list reference.ParentTable.Columns as column> T1.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} as T1_${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}, </#list> <#list Columns as column> T2.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} as T2_${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#if column_has_next>, </#if> </#list> FROM ${reference.ParentTable.CodeUnderlineUpper} AS T1 RIGHT JOIN ${CodeUnderlineUpper} AS T2 ON <#list reference.ArrowColumnList as arrowColumn>T2.${arrowColumn.ArrowTailColumn.CodeUnderlineUpper} = T1.${arrowColumn.ArrowHeadColumn.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#if arrowColumn_has_next>, </#if> </#list>
</#list> </#if>
<#-- 存在子级 --> <#if RefChildren?exists> <#list RefChildren as reference>
<#list Columns as column>
</#list>
<#list reference.ChildTable.Columns as column>
</#list>
SELECT <#list reference.ChildTable.Columns as column> T1.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} as T1_${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}, </#list> <#list Columns as column> T2.${column.CodeUnderlineUpper} as T2_${column.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#if column_has_next>, </#if> </#list> FROM ${reference.ChildTable.CodeUnderlineUpper} AS T1 RIGHT JOIN ${CodeUnderlineUpper} AS T2 ON <#list reference.ArrowColumnList as arrowColumn>T1.${arrowColumn.ArrowTailColumn.CodeUnderlineUpper} = T2.${arrowColumn.ArrowHeadColumn.CodeUnderlineUpper}<#if arrowColumn_has_next>, </#if> </#list>
</#list> </#if>
<#-- -- 调用函数 - mssql
SELECT dbo.function_name(#{xxx})
-- 调用函数 - oracle
SELECT dbo.function_name(#{xxx}) from dual
-- 调用函数
{ call dbo.func_name( #{a, mode = IN, jdbcType=java.lang.Integer}, #{a, mode = OUT, jdbcType=java.lang.Integer} ) }
{ call getBlogsAndAuthors( #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN} ) }
-->
